author: James Martin
method: Mix the sausage meat, the lime juice and chopped coriander in a bowl. Mould into three patties and dust in the flour. Fry in a frying pan for 6-8 minutes or until cooked through. For the jam, in a pan add the onions with the figs, brown sugar and the white wine vinegar. Cook for eight minutes on a low heat until soft and syrupy. To serve, place the patties on a plate with the fig jam on the side.
ingredients: 3 sausages,  1 lime, juice only,  1 handful fresh coriander, chopped ,  50g/1¾oz, plain flour, to dust,  ½ onion, finely chopped ,  2 figs, sliced ,  50g/1¾oz brown sugar,  25ml/1 fl oz white wine vinegar
